compliant.section: You understand and consent to the transfer, storage, use or process of your Information to NUVOTON and any of its affiliated companies, service providers who may be located in a different country.
compliant.legal provisions: Data transfers outside the EEA are permitted, provided that appropriate safeguards are in place, such as standard contractual clauses, binding corporate rules, or an adequacy decision from the European Commission.

compliant.section: Said transfer, storage, or process of your Information, shall be subject to the Privacy Policy and applicable laws on privacy protection and personal information security.
compliant.legal provisions: Data transfers outside the EEA must comply with GDPR requirements, including appropriate safeguards and compliance with applicable laws.

compliant.section: We have put in place appropriate technical and organisational measures to keep the Personal Information we collect in our Websites and NUVOTON’s APP secure.
compliant.legal provisions: Data controllers and processors must implement appropriate technical and organisational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk, including the pseudonymisation and encryption of personal data.

non_compliant.section: You understand and consent to the transfer, storage, use or process of your Information to NUVOTON and any of its affiliated companies, service providers who may be located in a different country.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Consent must be freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous. It must be as easy to withdraw consent as it is to give it.
non_compliant.amend: It is recommended to clarify what the "legitimate interest" is for transferring data outside the EEA and to provide users with a clear and easy way to withdraw their consent. Consider providing alternative methods to access services without requiring consent for data transfer.

non_compliant.section: Said transfer, storage, or process of your Information, shall be subject to the Privacy Policy and applicable laws on privacy protection and personal information security.
non_compliant.legal provisions: The privacy policy should be concise, transparent, intelligible and easily accessible. It should use clear and plain language, particularly for any information addressed specifically to a child.
non_compliant.amend: Provide specific information about the safeguards in place for international data transfers, such as the use of standard contractual clauses or binding corporate rules. Clearly identify the legal basis for processing personal data, including the specific purposes for each processing activity.

non_compliant.section: We have put in place appropriate physical, technical and organisational measures to keep the Personal Information we collect in our Websites and NUVOTON’s APP secure.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data protection by design and by default. The controller shall implement appropriate technical and organisational measures for ensuring that, by default, only personal data which are necessary for each specific purpose of the processing are processed.
non_compliant.amend: Detail the specific technical and organisational measures implemented, such as encryption, access controls, and staff training. Explain how data protection is integrated into the design and development of systems and services. Consider conducting regular data protection impact assessments (DPIAs) to identify and mitigate risks.
